trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_RecognizeCompleted" name="RecognizeCompleted" href=""></xref> event raised by a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Adja meg az adatait a <xref uid="langword_csharp_RecognizeCompleted" name="RecognizeCompleted" href=""> </xref> esemény jelenik meg, amelyet egy <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> vagy egy <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> objektum.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> or the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> object raises its `SpeechRecognized` event after completing a `RecognizeAsync` operation.
trans-unit.target: Példányának <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>jön létre, amikor a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>vagy a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>objektum vált ki a `SpeechRecognized` esemény befejezése után egy `RecognizeAsync` művelet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>

trans-unit.source: For more information about speech recognition events, see [Using Speech Recognition Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).
trans-unit.target: Beszéd felismerés eseményekkel kapcsolatos további információkért lásd: [használatával Beszéd felismerés események](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).

trans-unit.source: Gets the location in the input device's audio stream associated with the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a bemeneti eszköz hangadatfolyamhoz tartozó helyét a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted"> </xref> esemény.

trans-unit.source: This property references the position at the beginning of the recognized phrase in the input device's generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: Ez a tulajdonság helyezi a elején a felismert kifejezést a beviteli eszköz létrehozott hangadatfolyam hivatkozik.

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> property references the recognizer's position within its audio input.
trans-unit.target: Ezzel szemben a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>tulajdonság hivatkozik a felismerő pozíció belül a hangbemenetet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: Ezek a pozíciók eltérő lehet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Speech Recognition Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).
trans-unit.target: További információkért lásd: [használatával Beszéd felismerés események](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).

trans-unit.source: The location in the input device's audio stream associated with the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: A bemeneti eszköz hangadatfolyamhoz tartozó helyét a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted"> </xref> esemény.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a babble timeout generated the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Egy érték, amely azt jelzi, hogy babble időtúllépés létre lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted"> </xref> esemény.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> has detected only background noise for longer than was specified by its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout*> property; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false." name="false." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> észlelt csak háttérzaj hosszabb volt megadva a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout*>tulajdonság; ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false." name="false." href=""> </xref> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether an initial silence timeout generated the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Egy érték, amely azt jelzi, hogy egy kezdeti csend időtúllépés létre lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted"> </xref> esemény.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> has detected only silence for a longer time period than was specified by its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout*> property; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false." name="false." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> csak csend észlelt egy hosszabb időszak volt megadva, mint a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout*>tulajdonság; ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false." name="false." href=""> </xref> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the input stream ended.
trans-unit.target: Egy érték, amely jelzi, hogy befejeződött-e a bemeneti adatfolyam lekérdezi.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer sets this property to `true` when a file provides the input stream for the recognizer and the end of the file is reached.
trans-unit.target: A felismerő értékűre állítja ezt a tulajdonságot `true` amikor egy fájl a bemeneti adatfolyam biztosít a felismerő, és elérte-e a fájl végét.

trans-unit.source: The end of the input stream can coincide with a successful recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: A bemeneti adatfolyam végén is egybe egy sikeres felismerés műveletet.

trans-unit.source: For more information about using a file as the input stream, see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: A fájl a bemeneti adatfolyamként használatával kapcsolatos további információkért lásd: a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>és <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>módszerek.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the recognizer no longer has audio input; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha a felismerő nincs már hangbemenetet; Ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a felismerési eredmények.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object derives from <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> and contains full information about a phrase returned by a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>objektum származik <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>és a felismerési művelet által visszaadott kifejezés teljes információt tartalmaz.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: The recognition result if the recognition operation succeeded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ha a felismerési művelet sikeresen befejeződött; felismerés eredménye Ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
